summary: This document is a docketing notice from the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit regarding the filing of a notice of criminal appeal by Ghislaine Maxwell in her case (21-770). It includes administrative correspondence about filing a notice of appearance and provides electronic document stamps and filenames.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: She is the appellant in the criminal case United States of America v. Maxwell, filing a notice of criminal appeal.

persons.name: Bobbi C. Sternheim
persons.context: She is listed as a recipient of the docketing notice and associated documents, indicating she is counsel of record in the case.

connections.description: Bobbi C. Sternheim is listed as a recipient of legal documents related to Ghislaine Maxwell's criminal appeal, indicating she is representing Maxwell.

events.title: Notice of Criminal Appeal Filed
events.description: A notice of criminal appeal is filed on behalf of Ghislaine Maxwell in the United States Court of Appeals for the Second Circuit, case number 21-770.

keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell filed a notice of criminal appeal in the Second Circuit Court of Appeals on March 24, 2021, under case number 21-770.
Attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim is listed as counsel of record receiving the docketing notice for Maxwell's appeal.
The document includes electronic filing stamps and references to district court dockets, indicating it is part of the formal appellate process.
